The correct answer is C: [00:03:25 - 00:03:36]. 

The audio reveals that the men arrive at camp and start a fire where they mention cooking steaks and meats. They then cheer and say "Cheers!" indicating their enjoyment. A man in the background can be seen holding a can, which might suggest they are in a remote location without access to traditional cooking utensils. The text "SteaksOfDiego" and "meats of Nelson" also suggest that they are cooking specific types of meat, possibly as part of a meal or event.
